headline: Evercore Reiterates Outperform on Arista Networks (ANET), Removes Stock From Tactical List
summary: Arista Networks Inc (NYSE:ANET) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 11, Evercore ISI reiterated an “Outperform” rating on the stock with a $175.00 price target. While the firm remains bullish on ANET’s networking demand, it has removed the stock from its Tactical Outperform list. “We’re removing our Tactical OP […]
